pageContext.description: Dimensions: max. dim. 38.2mm; max T. 4.0; Wt. 13.9,Typology: plate gently tapering towards one thin edge,Manufacture: both faces undulating and with small hollows - likely cg. flaws; thin edge in as cast state, fine but rounded,Condition: rest of edges broken,Attached Material: very small deposits of whitish material
pageContext.surface: Occasional small patches black-brown surface little shiny and thin; rest flaked to bright gold surface; very small spot green corrosion.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - private (8),115 Hurstcourt Road, Sutton, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: PIF; AFI; DF(S); SI; CI; Rec.: SN Dec. 79; Source: Sb. A.; Sub. Inf.: via Jon Cotton (W. London F. U.) March 79
